name: CountdownTimer
0:
”Alexa, open countdown timer”
”Alexa, start countdown timer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: countdown timer
des:
Open the skill and ask Alexa for one of the pre-defined countdown timers. Alexa will read the into message and the countdown (10, 9, 8, ... 3, 2, 1), and then play a fun sound effect.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
